:::Thunder Hammer:::


Thunder Hammer hears a fire fight going on somewhere close by. He quickly 
tore thourgh and attacked Shadow Stalker and Firearm. He fired multiple 
shots at the two attackers. "Hey Injector, i thought you could use a little 
help." He smiled and started to attack more fierce. His wound from the 
earlier fight with the dinobots was still nagging at him, yet he still 
fought on.

>::Shadow Stalker::
>
>Shadow Stalker hears Firearm on his comm-link.  Shadow Stalker speaks into
>his comm-link, "Ok I'm coming to help you!"
>
>Shadow Stalker sees Firearm shooting at injector and decides to help out.
>Shadow Stalker shoots some blasts from his seeker gun directly at Injector.
>
>"Glad I could help, maybe we could stick together until we find the other
>maximals."  He says quickly taking some more shots at Injector.
